title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Controversy | Cori Bush
itunes:title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Controversy | Cori Bush
description:
Democrats strip Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene of her committee assignments, Roy Wood Jr. and Michael Kosta preview the Big Game, and Trevor interviews Congresswoman Cori Bush.


Please visit dailyshow.com/DreamingOutLoud to help provide healthy food, sustainable food systems and economic opportunity to marginalized communities.
